22 |     optional int32 o1 = 1 [packed = true];
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^                  ---- packed encoding set here
   = help: packed encoding encoding can only be set on repeated fields of
           integer, float, `bool`, or enum type

   |              ^                  ---- packed encoding set here
   = help: packed encoding encoding can only be set on repeated fields of
